headline: ALCATEL HELIUM LEAK DETECTOR

specstable:
Manufacturer Alcatel
Model ASM 52
High Vacuum Pump Type Diffusion Pump
Minimum Detectable Helium Leak Rate 2.0E-11 atm-cc/sec
Maximum Detectable Leak Rate 5.00E2 atm-cc/sec
Helium Pumping Speed at Inlet 4.70 l/s (9.96 CFM)
Internal Calibrated Leak Not Included
Built-In Roughing Pump Included
Liquid Nitrogen Trap Included

Roughing pump: Alcatel 2012A
Backing pump: Alcatel 2004A
Power Requirements 115 V 18.0 A 60 Hz 1 Phase
Exterior Dimensions
